title: Fundamental Health Care Plan
features: General Health Checkup Program for Students.
Lab Tests (Blood Grouping ABO, Urine R/E, Stool R/E).

title: Complete Health Care Plan
features: All items of the Broad Health Care Plan plus:
Basic Lab Tests (CBC, Lipid Profile, RFT, LFT, TSH, Uric Acid).

title: Broad Health Care Plan
features: Advanced Level Clinic Setup and Nursing Care.
Health Checkup of Students (General Checkup, Eye Checkup, Dental Checkup, ENT Checkup – twice a year).
Lab Tests (Blood Grouping ABO, Urine R/E, Stool R/E – twice a year).
